Articles.Content:
Alright. So I was launching rockets and all that stuff. So I saw a Kerbal I really liked the name of so I copied his persistence script so I could put him in other saves. But I realized something weird. In the persistence the number for his courage (brave) is really low, but in game, under the info tab in the map view, the courage bar is really high. So I was wondering, is he really brave or a coward? If I change the value e seems to act the same. Maybe because his stupidity value is low. (That means he is a genius.)

So if anyone knows please tell me. And I have a feeling this is in the wrong section, so if it is please move it! Thanks!

Edited July 1, 2013 by RocketTurtle
I don't really know much about their stats. Also I get the feeling that whole system is about to get a major overhaul.
Probably. I just haven't got the foggiest idea which stats to trust!
Ah, got it, on the info tab the higher the courage the less courageous they are.
